## cli options

```bash
# run only last failed
pytest --lf tests/

# show local variables in traceback
pytest -l tests/

# enter PDB at first failure and stop test session after
pytest -x --pdb tests/

# re-run all tests starting with last failed test first
pytest --ff tests/

# run a subset of tests
pytest -k 'foo or bar' tests/test_foobar.py

# run tests in parallel (pytest-xdist)
pytest -n 4|auto

# flaky tests (pytest-rerunfailures)
pytest -reruns 5
```
